signatures.text: operator fun <K, V> MutableMap<in K, in V>.plusAssign( pair: Pair<K, V>)
signatures.desc: Appends or replaces the given pair in this mutable map.

signatures.text: operator fun <K, V> MutableMap<in K, in V>.plusAssign( pairs: Iterable<Pair<K, V>>)
signatures.desc: Appends or replaces all pairs from the given collection of pairs in this mutable map.

signatures.text: operator fun <K, V> MutableMap<in K, in V>.plusAssign( pairs: Array<out Pair<K, V>>)
signatures.desc: Appends or replaces all pairs from the given array of pairs in this mutable map.

signatures.text: operator fun <K, V> MutableMap<in K, in V>.plusAssign( pairs: Sequence<Pair<K, V>>)
signatures.desc: Appends or replaces all pairs from the given sequence of pairs in this mutable map.

signatures.text: operator fun <K, V> MutableMap<in K, in V>.plusAssign( map: Map<K, V>)
signatures.desc: Appends or replaces all entries from the given map in this mutable map.

signatures.text: operator fun <T> MutableCollection<in T>.plusAssign( element: T)
signatures.desc: Adds the specified element to this mutable collection.

signatures.text: operator fun <T> MutableCollection<in T>.plusAssign( elements: Iterable<T>)
signatures.desc: Adds all elements of the given elements collection to this mutable collection.

signatures.text: operator fun <T> MutableCollection<in T>.plusAssign( elements: Array<T>)
signatures.desc: Adds all elements of the given elements array to this mutable collection.

signatures.text: operator fun <T> MutableCollection<in T>.plusAssign( elements: Sequence<T>)
signatures.desc: Adds all elements of the given elements sequence to this mutable collection.
